about_the_game:
CREATE YOUR SANCTUARY

Venture into the wilds to find furniture and collectables, catch fish, and collect bugs to bring back to your fully customisable sanctuary.

5 UNIQUE AREAS

Traverse and glide through 5 unique areas, uncovering secrets and meeting a cast of eclectic characters.

THE STORY OF A DYING WORLD

A prequel to the events of Star Farmer: Warlock of the Universe, stave off the death of the planet by creating a sanctuary and healing the environment around you.

FEATURES

  • Create your unique sanctuary amidst a dying world.
  • Go fishing and catch bugs to bring back your growing safe haven.
  • Attract unique fauna to your sanctuary as it grows.
  • Follow the story of a dying world and your role in its last stand.
  • Glide through the skies in Tora's Garden's vertical environments.
  • Help the locals that deal with the challenges a dying world brings.
  • Find hidden furniture, plants, props and more to decorate your sanctuary.

name: Tora's Garden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Catch fish, collect bugs, find furniture and help the locals as you create your sanctuary on a dying world.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Norwegian*
*languages with full audio support
